not_a_group: This command can only be used in groups.
invalid_command: 🤨 — Command used in the wrong way. Try: {cmd}
start:
Hi! I'm a bot that can help you
collect
waifus or husbandos from various animes. To get started, type /help
help: There is a list of commands you can use: /start - Start the bot /help - Get a list of commands /language - Change the language used to display messages /list - List all the waifus/husbandos you have collected /delete - Delete a waifu/husbando
language: Select the language you want to use to display messages:
language_set: The language has been set to {new_lang}
new_character: 🎰 A mysterious character appears...! 🔥 — Reply to this message with the character's name to collect it.
no_characters: Oops! You haven't collected any characters yet in this group. Go get one to use this feature. 🔙
has_character: 🤚 You already have this character in this group.
max_characters: You have reached the maximum number of characters you can collect. ⛔
not_a_character: This is not a valid character. ⁉️
wrong_character: ⚠️ — Oops! The character's name isn't this, try again.
character_escaped:
Oops... the character <details>{name}</details> has escaped! (❌)

🔖 Remember them and be faster next time!
expired_character: This character has expired and can no longer be collected. (❌)
unknown_character: 🤔 — I couldn't find that character. Try again.
character_collected: 🏆 — Congratulations! You got it right and captured... {name} 🔥
